name: ga.plugin
title: jQuery Google Analytics Async Plugin
description: This plugin enhances online measurement of sites that are tracked through Google Analytics (GA) Async. The plugin provides the following functionality: submits events to GA when visitors click on document/file links, external links and email addresses links; tracks 404 pages by submitting page referral data to GA; tracks visitors clicking across multiple domain; tracks redirects as events (through a configurable hash tag in the URL) and can provide visitors with a message about redirect.
